description: This tests a list of s3 buckets to see if they have dir listings enabled or if they are uploadable

name: cybercdh
author: dirlstr
description: Finds Directory Listings or open S3 buckets from a list of URLs

description: Burp extension that performs a passive scan to identify cloud buckets and then test them for publicly accessible vulnerabilities

name: kicks3
author: abuvanth
description: S3 bucket finder from html,js and bucket misconfiguration testing tool

name: 2tearsinabucket

description: A security toolkit for Amazon S3

name: s3cario

description: This tool will get the CNAME first if it's a valid Amazon s3 bucket and if it's not, it will try to check if the domain is a bucket name.
